fields.brochure_text:
Availability in October 2026 or summer 2027.
Pricing of €8,500.00 for 2026 and €8,900.00 for 2027, which includes:
- The Le Pavillon room located at the rear of the Château, offering a panoramic view of the old building.
- The Château's six ‘Prestige’ rooms and Junior Suites, which can accommodate around twenty guests.
- A secluded location with bucolic surroundings.
The package includes:
  
- The fully equipped 700m² Le Pavillon reception room, with sound system and lighting, until 5pm on Sunday
- Use of the kitchens by our team or your caterer
- Provision of tables and chairs for up to 300 people (cocktail capacity: 450 people - seated meal: 250 people)
- Accommodation at the Château for the night from Saturday to Sunday until 12 noon (with the option of renting the outbuildings for additional beds)
- The party can continue until 4 a.m.
- The room is available on Friday afternoon if you wish to set up your decorations and deliver anything else you need to ensure your wedding runs smoothly. 
- There is a car park with space for around 100 cars.
In addition, catering services can be provided for the reception, meal or brunch.

Visits of the estate and Le Pavillon hall are possible to get a feel for the venue.

Some information about the venue www.chateaulagut.com which is situated in the beautiful Dordogne in the South west of France.

Chateau Lagut is more than just a wedding venue. You will have the whole venue for your exclusive use As if it would be your home, you stay on the venue and you organize your wedding according to YOUR idea. You accommodate yourself and your guests for several days in the château and gîtes during your wedding week-end. What a thrill to prepare the wedding together! And what a joy to extend the party with your guests! 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château. The price for a weekend (Friday-Sunday) in Oktober 2026, In April, May 2027 is €9.500. VAT is included in the price and 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château and the price is including sheets, towels and cleaning for the gîtes and château. It’s possible to stay more days if you want (additional pricing available). For a wedding during the week (Monday-Thursday) the price is €8500 in Oktober, April and May. We don’t have availability anymore in September 2026.

There are also 9 glamping tents with comfortable beds and in the tents can stay 32 people in total
The price for the glamping tents is €27 a person per night (including sheets and towels).In total (gîtes, château and tents) 78 people can stay at the property, but there are several hotels and b&b’s in the neighborhood for your other guests to stay or there is the possibility that they bring their own tent and can stay at the property.

For a small wedding, it can take place in the castle and the different rooms, each with its own atmosphere and own charm. For larger groups, the beautiful banquet hall is perfect. The natural stone walls and the wood-beamed ceiling give this room a lot of charm and can then be decorated entirely to your own taste. With an area of 300 m2 it is suitable for a maximum of 200 guests. The professional kitchen is fully equipped and can be used by the caterer of your choice, so you can enjoy a culinary (wedding) dinner in a unique location. No corkage charge. The natural beauty of the wine cellars can be a perfect place for the reception. The atmosphere is one of unique, laid-back elegance providing for an intimate, down-to-earth experience. Round tables for 120 persons and chairs are available for free.

We have bbq’s and a wonderful bread oven in which you can make delicious pizzas.

The venue can accommodate 200 people (inside and outside) for the ceremony and you are free to choose the place on the venue where you prefer to do it (lots of wonderful spots to organize this). There is also a very nice little chapel at the venue that can be used for the ceremony. We don’t charge anything for the ceremony.

Wedding preparations take lot of time and D-Day always goes too fast. Take the time to share and extend those precious moments with your loved ones. Take pleasure in offering them not only a beautiful ceremony and party, but a truly relaxing stay, where everyone you love will bond deeper together.

Rediscover the taste of simple pleasures: have breakfast all together, prepare for the ceremony in your room with your friends a glass of champagne in hand, lounge by the pool the day after, take a nap under the trees in the park while your grandmothers chat in the living room ...

You organize your wedding at your idea and with no time limit (so you can continue the party until the early hours in the morning), no corkage fees…just as it would be at home, with personal advice and support to assist in organizing the wedding. There is also a wedding planner that can organize everything.

On the venue you can really find every possible facility to have a pleasant stay. There is a big heated swimming pool that is operational all year, a tennis court, a petanque court, a trampoline for young and old, a sauna and jacuzzi to really relax and enjoy the beautiful starry sky, a treehouse, table tennis and lots more.

Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is also available on site.

The natural beauty of the place and the tranquillity that prevails gives a unique and rare atmosphere to share special moments with your loved ones. Enjoy a stunning sunset with panoramic views over the surrounding countryside; Everything is in place to make your wedding that much more special.

The airport from Limoges and Bergerac are about 1 hour driving and the airport from Bordeaux 1h30.
